pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This contains the DRL (Deep Reinforce Learning) Agent to lower delays or boost throughput performace in existing and future TCP Congestion Controls.
DRL combines Reinforced Learning and Deep Neural Networks.
Prebuilt modules are provided for BBR, Cubic, Illinois, Westwood.

use.flag: Install celluar-traces to train the DRL.
Install the kernel patch to apply on kernel sources.
